EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry We Missed You at Le Pré-Catelan
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Guest}}, We are sorry you were unable to join us for brunch at Le Pré-Catelan in Paris on 16th June. We hope to be able to invite you to this and similar events in the future and so would ask that you take a moment to register to continue to receive the latest news, offers and invitations from us. Registration is quick and easy and can be completed here.
CLICK HERE TO REGISTER <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]>
We look forward to meeting with you very soon. Kind regards, The Honeywell Team
